author: vkhristenko
body:
a follow up on this PR: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13561

HCAL DQM would like to add a 3rd application to the 2 existing ones. It doesn't affect the offline processing, in that sense it's identical to the PR above. However it adds DQM/Integration.... hcal2_source... configuration-application to be used in Online DQM together with the standard 2.

VK
title: Online HCAL DQM adding a 3rd application
